item.description:
NOTE: We're now meeting on the ground level of the Town Hall, and not the second floor.

Special Guest:
This month we're lucky to have Bud Thorpe of SOPHA fame come talk to us briefly about SOPHA and the Kickstart Lighting Program they are bringing to us right here in Exeter this Spring.

Bud will answer any and all questions on SOPHA (NH's premiere member based studio), lighting, camera gear rentals, the Kickstart program, sensor cleaning, anything else photo related he knows about (which covers a lot), or why photographers are so much better looking than CPAs.

 

Monthly Challenge: 
Our challenge for this month's meeting is "Night". Or is it "Knight"?. Why don't you decide for yourself and let us know? Between now and the the meeting, take and bring 1-3 photographs which somehow speak to your interpretation of the subject - please feel free to take great liberty with your interpretation of the subject.

Don't be shy, we have a very encouraging group of critics and we'll all learn something from the experience. Most of all, have fun shooting!

Send monthly challenge photos via email to John. Photos should be JPEGs, no less than 1000 pixels high. A PDF with full details, an FAQ, and email details for the Monthly Challenge is located in the File Library, available to members


Location:
We're now meeting at the beautiful Town Hall Gallery building, directly across from the bandstand and Town Hall Offices.

Park on the street or in the nearby municipal lot and walk on over. NOTE: We're now meeting on the larger ground level - the main hall.


Other:
Bring other photos if you'd like feedback or critique, and be prepared to [helpfully] critique others'.

Anything photography- or photographer-related is fair game.
item.how_to_find_us: The gallery is in historic downtown Exeter. The door will be open, come on in.
item.name: Seacoast Photographers Group Monthly Meetup
